description:
cmd/6g: fix use of large integers as indexes or array sizes.

A check for smallintconst was missing before generating the
comparisons.

Fixes issue 4348.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=2b08c2106305 ***

cmd/6g: fix use of large integers as indexes or array sizes.

A check for smallintconst was missing before generating the
comparisons.

Fixes issue 4348.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev

subject: code review 6815088: cmd/6g: fix use of large integers as indexes or array sizes.
